reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the B&B for 1 night after a wedding near-by and from start to finish our stay was faultless. The owners were both very friendly and accommodating, the house is in lovely condition, the rooms were big, the bathrooms were well stocked and the breakfast was lush.
reviews.title: Couldn't fault it - lovely stay

reviews.text: We have just returned from a truely wonderful stay at High Lodge Farm, myself my partner and my father stayed as a Father's Day treat, Kirsten is the perfect host, the rooms are fantastic beds very comfortable not to mention the amazing shower and views :-) Breakfast was without a doubt the nicest freshly cooked breakfast we have ever had. Would highly recommend staying here and would most definitely return :-)
reviews.title: Excellent Stay

reviews.text: My Parents, my Sister and her Husband and I stayed here from Friday 31st May to 1st June and I cannot recommend it enough. It was about 10/15 minutes away from the wedding venue (Wyck Hill House). We were met by Kirsten, the Lady of the house whom I had been in contact with via email and I felt I knew her when she opened the door, a lovely welcoming person. Our rooms were fabulous and spacious with loads of natural light. I don't think I ever had as good a sleep as my two nights here. Breakfast was scrumptious and freshly cooked to order. My only regret is that I didn't have another few days in the area.
reviews.title: Just a most beautiful place to stay, rooms stunning, beds really comfy, great shower and a lovely home cooked breakfast.

reviews.text: I booked highlodge for a birthday break for my mums 60th And i can honestly say we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at highlodge farm we are extremely fussy people when it comes to cleanliness and this has to be one if the most cleanest places I have ever stayed in and in my job I have stayed in plenty,!!! The B&B itself is beautiful and so is the surroundings the owners Kirsten and Simon are extremely lovely welcoming people and we honestly couldn't thank them enough for making our stay wonderful couldn't recommend any higher 100%
reviews.title: Highly recommended place to stay in the Cotswolds

reviews.text: What an absolutely fabulous B&B, a great experience from start to finish and would recommend it to one and all!
reviews.title: Superb B&B
